title: My Champion Idea.
body:
Here's an idea of a champion I have been working on for a while now and I wanted to post the idea publicly so I can receive some feedback on the idea and concept of this champion. (Note there is an actual splash art in progress but things take time.) His main role I would say is Tank/Bruiser ideal for the top lane or jungle his early game would be weak against heavy poke champions that can easily sustain in lane such as Vlad or Rumble but I believe would be useful during teamfights for his decent cc and his ability to tank and deal substantial damage. 

Here's some sick fan art done by DavePowa on the NA server so show him some love:
http://i.imgur.com/tdRca0o.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/C6rlrDu.png[/img]

Uriah The Bionic Arbiter

Attack range125 (Melee.)
Attack speed 0.615 + 0.75% per lvl.
Health 560 +80 per lvl.
Health regen 9.30 +0.90 per lvl.
Mana 264 + 35.5 per lvl.
Mana regen 6.25 + 0.45 per lvl.
AD 53 + 3.5 per lvl.
Armour 27 + 3 per lvl.
Magic res 22 + 2 per lvl.
Movement speed 325.

Passive: For every 20 points in bonus movement speed Uriah gains 5% bonus attack speed.

Q: Uriah creates a sweeping motion with his sword in a cone dealing 40/50/60/70/80 (+40% of AD) physical damage.
Any targets hit at the end of the sweep are knocked up and stunned for 1 second.
Mana cost: 45 at all lvls, Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8, Range: 500.

W: Uriah amplifies his leg armaments gaining 15/25/35/45/55 +2 points per lvl bonus armour and magic resistance, but his movement speed is reduced by 20/30/40/50/60.
This ability is toggled.
(This does in turn affect his passive reducing his attack speed.)
Mana cost: 30/35/40/45/50, Cooldown: 16/15/14/13/12.

E: Uriah leaps in a target direction dealing 5/6/7/8/10% of any target in his landing locations current health.
If Uriah collides with terrain he jumps again at a 45% angle opposite from the direction that he originally jumped from.
Mana cost: 40/50/60/70/80, Cooldown: 15/14/13/12/11, Range: 425 (Bonus jump is 325.)

R: Uriah shoots pure energy from his sword in a cone in front of him silencing enemy champions within 350 range for 1/1.5/2 seconds if it connects with an enemy champion an additional wave extending 200 range appears slowing anyone beyond that for 20/30/40% (+3% per 100 bonus AD) dealing 100/150/200 (+20% of AD)
Mana cost: 100 at all lvls, Cooldown: 120/110/100, Range: 550.

Recommended basic build path: Pot and Doran's shield --> Brutaliser --> Base Boots --> Youmuu's Ghostblade and from their situational (Imo I would probably build items like Iceborn/Frozenheart, Visage/Banshees/Maw, Bloodthrister/BOTRK for some damage and then Righteous Glory/Warmogs/Thronmail/Guardian Angel.)

Uriah’s Lore:
As a struggling urchin on the streets of Zaun, he struggled to find his way in the world as he had no particular talents,
he was not strong, or fast and lacked the intelligence to pursue a future in technology. 
Surviving on scraps found in the streets as the only thing of worth in his possession is his claymore which was given as a gift given to him during his early childhood and he would not part with it for the world.
One day Uriah heard rumors of a man in Zaun capable of removing ones human imperfections and replacing them through augmentation.
Seeming like Uriah’s only hope of making something of himself he sought out this revered man of science.
Upon arrival of the discussed location Uriah had thought of what he would have perfected his arms so that he may be strong and wield the skills necessary to use his precious sword
and his legs so that he may move quicker than ever before.
When Uriah finally met this strange man he told him this and he quickly agreed to help him as he sought it as part of this so called glorious evolution.
It almost seemed to good to be true he was getting all that he could have ever wanted a chance of greatness.
As Uriah awoke he discovered to his surprise just how easily his new found parts responded and with faster reflexes than he could have imagined as he looked for his sword he saw it could not be seen.
Uriah flew into a rage smashing the operating room with his new found strength in his mechanical arms.
The man came through the door into the room and before Uriah could accuse him of theft he brought out from his cloak Uriah’s sword only it was different it had small tubes of energy coursing through it, it looked pure and powerful.
The man extended out his hand saying “A gift from the glorious evolution unto one of its loyal subjects” Uriah nodded graciously.
The man told him of the task which he required in return for this favour which was to bring justice to those who would oppose this great destiny to act as an arbiter for the machines.
Uriah finally discovering his calling set out to aid in what way he can in the glorious evolution although remaining sceptical of his saviours true intentions.

“Justice and evolution hand in hand” - Uria

Possible Quotes:

To Enemy Viktor: "Don't worry Viktor it's not the size of the hard-drive that matters its how you use it"

To Ally Viktor: "For the evolution!"

To Enemy Blitzcrank: "Time to come home Blitzcrank"

To Ally Blitzcrank: "Welcome home Blitzcrank"

To Enemy Jayce: "You cannot stop us Jayce"

To Enemy Jinx: "Such a lust for destruction would be useful to my cause!"

To Enemy Ekko: "No matter how many times you try you will not stop the evolution!"

To Enemy Twisted Fate: "Hey uhhh nice hair"

To Enemy Urgot: "Clearly they didn't spend enough bringing you back"

To Enemy Gnar: "I want to pat you but I won't"

To Enemy Brand: "So what does lava feel like on the flesh?"

To Enemy Swain: "Good birdy... nice birdy"

To Enemy Vi: "Without those gloves you are nothing!"

To Enemy Orianna: "Such perfection gone to waste"

Basic Movement: "Only machines can truly bring justice", "I go", "It's nearly time"

Attack Move: "Tear them apart!", "They are flawed!", "No one shall save them"

Basic Taunt: *Places sword in its sheath and folds arms* "I am more evolved than you shall ever be!", "I'm sure we would have room for you in the chair department"

Basic Joke: *Fiddles with helmet lights* "Darn need some more headlight fluid", "Hey who turned out the lights?!"

(For those who may be confused by the additional wave effect think of it as Bard's meep autos once he has 25 stacks.) Let me know what you think and if the change is a good thing!
